Html:
Hello guys,

I need help to get client list of all computers that are connected on each AP.
Any ideas?

Cheers,

Michel Trettim

In general. What you want to do, is to connect to a given network (I don't believe sorting by AP is possible at this stage), and then iterate the subnet - all computers available (Addresses). Then find the ones that reply to ping - and you have a basic list....

It isn't possible to dump a list of connecteds. Unless your the network admin (have access to either the RADIUS server, or the router), and that this has a list of connected computers, that you can retrieve.
